Uses of Class
pitt.search.semanticvectors.vectors.ComplexVector

  • Packages that use ComplexVector 
    Package Description
    pitt.search.semanticvectors.vectors
    Core representations and operations on vectors over different ground fields.

    • Uses of ComplexVector in pitt.search.semanticvectors.vectors

      Methods in pitt.search.semanticvectors.vectors that return ComplexVector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ComplexVector ComplexVector.copy()
      Returns a new copy of this vector, in dense format.
      ComplexVector ComplexVector.generateRandomVector(int dimension, int numEntries, Random random)
      Generates a basic sparse vector in Polar form with the format { offset, phaseAngle, offset, phaseAngle, ...
      ComplexVector ComplexVector.generateRandomVector(int dimension, Random random)
      Generates a basic dense vector in Polar form
      Methods in pitt.search.semanticvectors.vectors with parameters of type ComplexVector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ComplexVector.convolve(ComplexVector other, int direction)
      Convolves this vector with the other.
      void ComplexVector.convolveCartesian(ComplexVector other, int direction)
      Convolves this vector with the other.
      protected double ComplexVector.measureCartesianAngularOverlap(ComplexVector other)
      Measure overlap, again using the sum of cosines of phase angle difference.
      protected double ComplexVector.measureHermitianOverlap(ComplexVector other)
      Measure overlap, again using the Hermitian / Euclidean scalar product.
      protected double ComplexVector.measurePolarDenseOverlap(ComplexVector other)
      Measures overlap of two vectors using mean cosine of difference of phase angles.
      static void ComplexVectorUtils.renderOrthogonal(ComplexVector vec1, ComplexVector vec2)
      Renders vec1 orthogonal to the corresponding component of vec2 where orthogonality is defined by a hermitian scalar product of 0 (rather than as a mean pairwise cosine between circular vectors of 0) Both vectors are in put into CARTESIAN mode.
      static void ComplexVectorUtils.renderPairwiseOrthogonal(ComplexVector vec1, ComplexVector vec2)
      Experimental: renders each circular component of vec1 orthogonal to the corresponding component of vec2 Both vectors are in put into CARTESIAN mode.
      static void ComplexVectorUtils.superposeWithAngle(ComplexVector vec1, ComplexVector vec2)
      Superposes vec2 with vec1.
      static void ComplexVectorUtils.superposeWithAngle(ComplexVector vec1, ComplexVector vec2, float weight, int[] permutation)
      Superposes vec2 with vec1 with weight and permutation.
      static void ComplexVectorUtils.superposeWithCoord(ComplexVector vec1, ComplexVector vec2)
      Superposes vec2 with vec1.
      static void ComplexVectorUtils.superposeWithCoord(ComplexVector vec1, ComplexVector vec2, float weight, int[] permutation)
      Superposes vec2 with vec1 with weight and permutation.
      static void ComplexVectorUtils.superposeWithSparseAngle(ComplexVector vec1, ComplexVector vec2, float weight, int[] permutation)
      Superposes vec2 with vec1 with weight and permutation.
